Action.Description: This action is to execute actions based on dynamic evaluation of parameters.

Action.Name: Action

Add Tile.Description: This action is used to add a new tile to the Dashboard report.
Add Tile.Name: Add Tile

Alter.Description: This action is used to open a specific report for alteration.
Alter.Name: Alter

Alter Collection.Description: This action is used to serve the collection of objects for alteration purposes. The second parameter optionally can provide object identifier. The third parameter allows providing an error message or no action to be taken. The fourth parameter is provided whether no operation should be performed in case the collection is empty, or trigger report should be opened.
Alter Collection.Name: Alter Collection

Alter Current Collection.Description: This action executes the alter collection on the collection defined at the object level.
Alter Current Collection.Name: Alter Current Collection

Alter Current Report.Description: This action executes a alter action on the Report defined at the object level.
Alter Current Report.Name: Alter Current Report

Alter Ex.Description: This action is  used to Alter Extended objects. Eg. User Security Level.This action inherits the object from the calling environment.
Alter Ex.Name: Alter Ex

Append.Description: This action is used to Append a new object after the selected object in current report. Eg. Appending a voucher in DayBook report.
Append.Name: Append

Audit Form.Description: This action is used to Audit forms.
Audit Form.Name: Audit Form

Audit Object.Description: This action is used to perform audit on the current object.
Audit Object.Name: Audit Object

Auto Columns.Description: This action is used to add an autorepeat column in a report.
Auto Columns.Name: Auto Columns

Auto Set.Description: This action is used in the Edit mode to set values to the variable or field.
Auto Set.Name: Auto Set

Backup Company.Description: This action is used to take Backup of specified company.
Backup Company.Name: Backup Company

Browse Url.Description: This action opens the item specified by the parameter. The item can be a file or folder or URL or Exe. If no parameter is there by default it will launch Tally website.
Browse Url.Name: Browse Url

Browse Url Ex.Description: This action is same as Browse URL, but waits till browse action is completed.

Meta.Aliases: Browse Url Ex, Exec Command Ex

Browse Url Ex.Name: Browse Url Ex

Calculator.Description: This action is used in a field which requires some computation.
Calculator.Name: Calculator

Call.Description: This action is used to call TDL function.
Call.Name: Call

Cancel Object.Description: This action is used to Cancel current object.
Cancel Object.Name: Cancel Object

Change Crypt Company.Description: This action is  used to change the Tally Vault passoword for a Company
Change Crypt Company.Name: Change Crypt Company

Change Output Mode.Description: Action to change output mode for print/export/mail/upload.
Change Output Mode.Name: Change Output Mode

Change Table.Description: This attribute allows calling a new Table or same table with appended values in the same field, without accepting the field or moving to the next field.
Change Table.Name: Change Table

Clear Table Stack.Description: Clear all stacked table from Change table action.
Clear Table Stack.Name: Clear Table Stack

Close Company.Description: This action is used to Close the selected Company.
Close Company.Name: Close Company

Configuration.Description: This action opens the configuration for the display report.
Configuration.Name: Configuration

Copy File.Description: This action is used to Copy of a file from One Folder to Another Folder (File to File),Uploading of Files from a given Path to a FTP Site,Downloading of File from FTP Site to specified location/folder.
Copy File.Name: Copy File

Copy To Clipboard.Description: This action is used to copy the string passed to Windows clipboard. It can be used to copy text from report in Display mode by adding a button to the report, and calling this action by passing appropriate string to be copied.
Copy To Clipboard.Name: Copy To Clipboard

Copy Variable.Description: This action copies values  from source variable to the destination variable. Copying of all variable types  are supported.
Copy Variable.Name: Copy Variable

Create.Description: This action is used to open a specific report for creating an object.
Create.Name: Create

Create Collection.Description: This action is used to Create Collection of objects which are used in menus such as Voucher collection,Client Rules collection etc.
Create Collection.Name: Create Collection

Create Ex.Description: This action is used to Create Extended objects. Eg. User Security Level.
Create Ex.Name: Create Ex

Cycle Back.Description: This action takes back to previous table.
Cycle Back.Name: Cycle Back

Delete Config Data.Description: This action is used to delete the config data object which can be either an Excel Map object or a Report object saved by the user from the Company or application level.
Delete Config Data.Name: Delete Config Data

Delete File.Description: This action is used to Delete a file from specified location/folder.
Delete File.Name: Delete File

Delete Object.Description: This action is used to Delete the current object.
Delete Object.Name: Delete Object

DisconnectUser.Description: This action is used to Disconnect the users from companies that are accessed from TallyPrime Server. This function will display a message to the clients, to close the company within 2 minutes  before forcing a close.
DisconnectUser.Name: DisconnectUser

Display.Description: This action is  used to display a specific report.
Display.Name: Display

Display Collection.Description: This action is used to serve the collection of objects for display purposes. The second parameter optionally can provide an object identifier. The third parameter allows providing an error message or no action to be taken. The fourth parameter is provided whether no operation should be performed in case collection is empty, or trigger report should be opened.
Display Collection.Name: Display Collection

Display Current Collection.Description: This action executes the display collection on the collection defined at the object level.
Display Current Collection.Name: Display Current Collection

Display Current Report.Description: This action executes a display action on the Report defined at the object level.
Display Current Report.Name: Display Current Report

Display Ex.Description: This action is used to Display Extended objects such as User Security Level.This action inherits the object from wherever it is called.
Display Ex.Name: Display Ex

Display Help.Description: This action is used to display context based help from tally reference chm file. It lanches the help file of the module if GUID is provided otherwise Context is picked from active report. If no report active then context is taken from current menu.
Display Help.Name: Display Help

Do If.Description: Do If evaluates the given condition to true or false. If true, it executes the specified action. It can also be used in user defined functions.

Parameters.Keywords: Accept Alter, Accept Create, Accept Object, Action, Add Sheet, Add Tile, Alter, Alter Collection, Alter Column, Alter Current Collection, Alter Current Report, Alter Ex, Alter Do If.Name: Do If

Dump Profile.Description: Dumps all Profiled Information to the file passed as Parameter.
Dump Profile.Name: Dump Profile

Dump Record.Description: Dumps all Recordings. Each recording is dumped with its name and Keys
Dump Record.Name: Dump Record

Duplicate.Description: This action is used to Duplicate the selected object in current report. Eg. Duplicating voucher in DayBook report.
Duplicate.Name: Duplicate

Exchange.Description: This action is used to exchange values of two variables. Variables should be same data type.
Exchange.Name: Exchange

Exec COM Interface.Description: This is used to invoke the defined COM Interface.
Exec COM Interface.Name: Exec COM Interface

Exec Excel Macro.Description: This action is used to execute a macro defined in an excel sheet.
Exec Excel Macro.Name: Exec Excel Macro

Execute Obj Actions.Description: This action is used at the field level to refer to the action label of the collection when an object is selected.
Execute Obj Actions.Name: Execute Obj Actions

Execute TDL.Description: Loads a TDL file and executes an action after loading optionally

Field Table Accept, Field Table Maximize, Field Table Mode, Field Toggle case, Field Undo, Field Up, Field Word Delete, Field Word Delete Left, Field Word Delete Right, Field Word Left, Field Word Right, Finalize ProgressBar, Focus Above Tile, F

Execute TDL.Name: Execute TDL

ExecuteObjectMap.Description: This action is used to execute the object map definition.
ExecuteObjectMap.Name: ExecuteObjectMap

Expand Tile.Description: This action is used to open the active tile report in the expanded view of the Dashboard.
Expand Tile.Name: Expand Tile

Export.Description: This action initiates data export activity using the given report.
Export.Name: Export

Export Collection.Description: This action is used to serve the collection of objects for export purposes. The second parameter optionally can provide an object identifier. The third parameter allows providing an error message or no action to be taken. The fourth parameter is provided whether no operation should be performed in case collection is empty, or trigger report should be opened.
Export Collection.Name: Export Collection

Export Current Collection.Description: This action executes the export collection on the collection defined at the object level.
Export Current Collection.Name: Export Current Collection

Export Current Report.Description: This action executes an Export action on the Report defined at the object level.
Export Current Report.Name: Export Current Report

Export Snapshot.Description: This action Exports the snapshot for  given company and rule.
Export Snapshot.Name: Export Snapshot

Focus Above Tile.Description: This action is used to shift the focus from the currently active tile to the tile above it in the Dashboard report.
Focus Above Tile.Name: Focus Above Tile

Focus Below Tile.Description: This action is used to shift the focus from the currently active tile to the tile below it in the Dashboard report.
Focus Below Tile.Name: Focus Below Tile

Focus Next Tile.Description: This action is used to shift the focus from the currently active tile to its next tile in the Dashboard report.
Focus Next Tile.Name: Focus Next Tile

Focus Previous Tile.Description: This action is used to shift the focus from the currently active tile to its previous tile in the Dashboard report.
Focus Previous Tile.Name: Focus Previous Tile

ForceDisconnectUser.Description: This action is used to forcefully disconnect the users from companies that are accessed from TallyPrime Server.
ForceDisconnectUser.Name: ForceDisconnectUser

Ignore Field.Description: This action allows clearing the text of the field. The second parameter also allows resetting the cursor to the position required.
Ignore Field.Name: Ignore Field

Import.Description: This action initiates data import activity using the given report.
Import.Name: Import

Import Snapshot.Description: This action Imports snapshot for the given company and rule.
Import Snapshot.Name: Import Snapshot

InitClientSync.Description: Requests the client(s) to initiate Synchronization. Used to initiate sync from server side.
InitClientSync.Name: InitClientSync

Insert.Description: This action is used to Insert a new object before the selected object in a current report. Eg. Inserting a voucher in DayBook report.
Insert.Name: Insert

List Add.Description: This action adds an element to the List variable based on Key.

Meta.Aliases: List Add, List Append, List Set

List Add.Name: List Add

List Add Ex.Description: This action adds an element to the List variable based on Index.

Meta.Aliases: List Add Ex, List Append Ex

List Add Ex.Name: List Add Ex

List Delete.Description: This action deletes element(s) from the specified List variable based on Key.
List Delete.Name: List Delete

List Delete Ex.Description: This action deletes element(s) from the specified List variable based on the Index value.

Meta.Aliases: List Delete Ex, List Remove Ex

List Delete Ex.Name: List Delete Ex

List Expand.Description: This action expands the List variable by specified number of elements.
List Expand.Name: List Expand

List Fill.Description: This action fills a List variable from a Collection.
List Fill.Name: List Fill

List Key Sort.Description: This action sorts the elements of List variable based on KEY.
List Key Sort.Name: List Key Sort

List Reset Sort.Description: This action resets the sort to the insertion order.
List Reset Sort.Name: List Reset Sort

List Value Sort.Description: This action sorts the element of the List Variable based on Value.
List Value Sort.Name: List Value Sort

Load Language.Description: This action is used to load a language dictionary given a language ID.
Load Language.Name: Load Language

Load TDL.Description: Specify file-path of the TDL to be loaded
Load TDL.Name: Load TDL

Load Variable.Description: This action loads the values of the variable which were persisted into a file.
Load Variable.Name: Load Variable

Log Object.Description: This action is to log the context object, its method and collection in the specified name.
Log Object.Name: Log Object

Mail.Description: This action mails the specified report.
Mail.Name: Mail

Mail Collection.Description: This action is used to serve the collection of objects for mail purpose. The second parameter optionally can provide object identifier. The third parameter allows providing an error message or no action to be taken. The fourth parameter is provided whether no operation should be performed in case the collection is empty, or trigger report should be opened.
Mail Collection.Name: Mail Collection

Mail Current Collection.Description: This action executes the mail collection on the collection defined at the object level.
Mail Current Collection.Name: Mail Current Collection

Mail Current Report.Description: This action executes a mail action on the Report defined at the object level.
Mail Current Report.Name: Mail Current Report

MailEx.Description: This action mails the specified report.
MailEx.Name: MailEx

MasterImport.Description: This action will import default masters to the current company. Currently only payroll masters gets re-imported
MasterImport.Name: MasterImport

Menu.Description: This action is used to launch a menu.
Menu.Name: Menu

Menu Reject All.Description: This action is used to Reject all menus.
Menu Reject All.Name: Menu Reject All

Modify Dashboard Variables.Description: This action is used to launch a report in Auto mode and modify the values of all existing tile variables if the scope is set to the dashboard. Once the modification is done successfully, all tiles will refresh to reflect the updated values.
Modify Dashboard Variables.Name: Modify Dashboard Variables

Modify Object.Description: This action is used to update/modify   multiple values of an object from any  level.
Modify Object.Name: Modify Object

Modify Original.Description: This action is used to launch a report in Auto mode and modify the value of a variables in the context of parent report. But this replaces the Current auto report with the specified report for variable modification.
Modify Original.Name: Modify Original

Modify System.Description: This action launches a report in Auto mode and allows to modify the  variables at system scope.
Modify System.Name: Modify System

Modify Variables.Description: This action is used to launch a report in Auto mode and modify the value of a variables in the context of parent report. After a successful modification, refreshes the parent report.
Modify Variables.Name: Modify Variables

Modify Variables Only.Description: This action is used to launch a report in Auto mode and modify the value of a variables in the context of parent report. But it does not refresh the parent report after acceptance.
Modify Variables Only.Name: Modify Variables Only

Multi Field Set.Description: This action is used to set values into multiple fields.
Multi Field Set.Name: Multi Field Set

Multi Set.Description: Sets the multiple Member Variable with the values specified. These members value pairs can be specified comma separated.
Multi Set.Name: Multi Set

Online Snapshot Exchange.Description: This action is initiates online snapshot exchange for the given company and rule.
Online Snapshot Exchange.Name: Online Snapshot Exchange

Playback Key.Description: This action is used to playback recorded macros.
Playback Key.Name: Playback Key

Popup Menu.Description: This action launches a popup menu from the button.
Popup Menu.Name: Popup Menu

Print.Description: This action is used to Print a report.
Print.Name: Print

Print Collection.Description: This action is used to serve the collection of objects for print purpose. The second parameter optionally can provide object identifier. The third parameter allows providing an error message or no action to be taken. The fourth parameter is provided whether no operation should be performed in case collection is empty, or trigger report should be opened.
Print Collection.Name: Print Collection

Print Current Collection.Description: This action executes the print collection on the collection defined at the object level.
Print Current Collection.Name: Print Current Collection

Print Current Report.Description: This action executes a print action on the Report defined at the object level.
Print Current Report.Name: Print Current Report

Refresh Data.Description: This action is used to update the company data in memory with latest updates from the  database in case of a multi user environment.
Refresh Data.Name: Refresh Data

Related Display.Description: This action is used to display other Related reports from current report. Eg. Dislaying movement analysis report in stock voucher report.
Related Display.Name: Related Display

Remove Tile.Description: This action is used to remove the active tile from a Dashboard report.
Remove Tile.Name: Remove Tile

Replace.Description: This Action is used to replace the current report by another such as Stock Item Creation,Godown Creation,Stock Group Creation reports can be switched among themselves.
Replace.Name: Replace

Reset Password.Description: Provides an option to user to change his password.
Reset Password.Name: Reset Password

Restore Company.Description: This action is used to Restore the specified company.
Restore Company.Name: Restore Company

Resume Record.Description: Used to Resume the Paused Recording.
Resume Record.Name: Resume Record

Save Variable.Description: The action SAVE VARIABLE is used to persist the Report Scope Variables in a user specified file.
Save Variable.Name: Save Variable

Select Company.Description: This action is used to Select a Company.
Select Company.Name: Select Company

Select Display.Description: This action is used to display list of reports belonging to a specific category such as displaying inventory reports/accounting reports from monthly summary report.
Select Display.Name: Select Display

Set.Description: This action to set values to the variable or Field.
Set.Name: Set

Set Field.Description: This action is used to set the value of the owner field in edit mode.
Set Field.Name: Set Field

Set Object Values.Description: The action Set Object values work only in the Edit mode of a Report . It updates/modifies the values of an object from current context as specified. The object values are updates in memory. The changes are stored in the Tally database only when the primary object is saved.
Set Object Values.Name: Set Object Values

Shut Company.Description: This action is used to Shutdown a Company.
Shut Company.Name: Shut Company

Shut Company Collection.Description: This action enables to shut company with a selection of a company from anywhere in the system.
Shut Company Collection.Name: Shut Company Collection

Sleep.Description: This action suspends the execution for specified Time.
Sleep.Name: Sleep

Start Debug.Description: Used to Start Debugging. All Expressions Evaluated will be Debugged.
Start Debug.Name: Start Debug

Start Profile.Description: Used to Start Profiling. Every Function, Collection Gather and Expressions Are Profiled once the Profiling has started.
Start Profile.Name: Start Profile

Start Record.Description: Used to Start Recording. Every Key entered will be recorded, which can be later used to Play Back.
Start Record.Name: Start Record

Start Service.Description: This action is used to start the specified service.
Start Service.Name: Start Service

Start Timer.Description: This Action starts a Timer for a specified Duration.
Start Timer.Name: Start Timer

Start Vat Session.Description: This action is used for Creating a session for VAT Upload.
Start Vat Session.Name: Start Vat Session

Stop Debug.Description: Used to Stop Debugging. If the First Parameter is Passed then the information is also dumped into the file.
Stop Debug.Name: Stop Debug

Stop Profile.Description: Used to Stop Profiling. If the First Parameter is Passed then the information is also dumped into the file.
Stop Profile.Name: Stop Profile

Stop Service.Description: This action is used to stop the specified service.
Stop Service.Name: Stop Service

Stop Timer.Description: This action stops the specified timer.
Stop Timer.Name: Stop Timer

Sub Form.Description: This action enables to execute a report through a button from the current context.
Sub Form.Name: Sub Form

Synchronize.Description: This action initiates synchronization and exchanges data between client and server.
Synchronize.Name: Synchronize

Synchronize Fixed.Description: Initiates synchronization and exchanges data between client and server
Synchronize Fixed.Name: Synchronize Fixed

Trigger Key.Description: This action is used to execute the Trigger Key action. This supports comma-separated list of expressions, each evaluating to give a key/key-sequence
Trigger Key.Name: Trigger Key

Unload TDL.Description: This action is used to unload the specified TDL by its name or GUID.
Unload TDL.Name: Unload TDL

Unzip.Description: Action to extract a zip archive file.
Unzip.Name: Unzip

Upload.Description: Mails specicfied report to output to given address in selected format
Upload.Name: Upload

Upload Vat Return.Description: This action is used for uploading VAT Returns.
Upload Vat Return.Name: Upload Vat Return

WhatsApp.Description: This action shares the specified report via WhatsApp.
WhatsApp.Name: WhatsApp

WhatsApp Collection.Description: This action is used to serve the collection of objects for WhatsApp purposes.
WhatsApp Collection.Name: WhatsApp Collection

WhatsApp Current Collection.Description: This executes the WhatsApp collection on the Collection defined at the object level.
WhatsApp Current Collection.Name: WhatsApp Current Collection

WhatsApp Current Report.Description: This executes a WhatsApp action on the Report defined at the object level.
WhatsApp Current Report.Name: WhatsApp Current Report

WriteINI.Description: This action is used to add/alter the value of any parameter in the specified INI file.
WriteINI.Name: WriteINI

Zip.Description: Action to create a zip archive file.
Zip.Name: Zip
